SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.service

Class GoalService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.service.GoalService
public class GoalService extends Object
Service class for managing financial goals in the application. This class provides functionality for creating, reading, updating, and deleting financial goals, as well as calculating progress and formatting goal-related data. All goal data is encrypted before storage and decrypted when retrieved.
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Method Details

    • getUserGoals

      public static List<Goal> getUserGoals(User user)
      Retrieves all goals associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose goals are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      A list of goals belonging to the user. Returns an empty list if no goals exist or if an error occurs

    • addGoal

      public static void addGoal(Goal goal, User user) throws IOException
      Adds a new financial goal for a user.
      Parameters:
      goal - The goal to be added
      user - The user who owns the goal
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the goal

    • updateGoal

      public static void updateGoal(Goal goal, User loggedUser) throws IOException
      Updates an existing financial goal.
      Parameters:
      goal - The updated goal data
      loggedUser - The user performing the update
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated goal
      SecurityException - If the user is not authorized to update the goal

    • deleteGoal

      public static void deleteGoal(String goalId, User user) throws IOException
      Deletes a specific goal for a user.
      Parameters:
      goalId - The ID of the goal to delete
      user - The user who owns the goal
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated goals list

    • saveGoals

      public static void saveGoals(List<Goal> goals, User user) throws IOException
      Saves a list of goals to encrypted storage.
      Parameters:
      goals - The list of goals to save
      user - The user who owns the goals
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving or encrypting the goals

    • calculateSavingProgress

      public static double calculateSavingProgress(double currentBalance, double targetAmount)
      Calculates the progress percentage for a saving goal.
      Parameters:
      currentBalance - The current amount saved
      targetAmount - The target amount to save
      Returns:
      The progress percentage (0-100)

    • calculateDebtProgress

      public static double calculateDebtProgress(double amountPaid, double totalDebt)
      Calculates the progress percentage for a debt repayment goal.
      Parameters:
      amountPaid - The amount paid towards the debt
      totalDebt - The total debt amount
      Returns:
      The progress percentage (0-100)

      Calculates the budget usage percentage.
      Parameters:
      currentExpense - The current expense amount
      budgetAmount - The total budget amount
      Returns:
      The budget usage percentage

    • getProgressColor

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color getProgressColor(String goalType, double progress, boolean isCompleted)
      Gets the appropriate color for a goal's progress indicator.
      Parameters:
      goalType - The type of goal (SAVING, DEBT_REPAYMENT, BUDGET_CONTROL)
      progress - The current progress percentage
      isCompleted - Whether the goal is completed
      Returns:
      The appropriate color for the progress indicator
